ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'
name: opentelemetry-instrumentation-redis
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "opentelemetry-instrumentation-redis" %}
{% set version = "0.60b0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/opentelemetry_instrumentation_redis-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e97121942d9cf8705e310fee3f1413d74356bf0426b96bf9508385e63fb8ab85

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - hatchling
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - opentelemetry-api ~=1.12
    - opentelemetry-instrumentation ==0.60b0
    - opentelemetry-semantic-conventions ==0.60b0
    - wrapt >=1.12.1
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.37b0
    # - opentelemetry-sdk ~=1.3
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-redis 
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.38b0
    # - opentelemetry-sdk ~=1.3
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-redis 
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.39b0
    # - opentelemetry-sdk ~=1.3
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-redis 
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.40b0
    # - opentelemetry-sdk ~=1.3
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-redis 
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.41b0
    # - opentelemetry-sdk ~=1.3
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-redis 
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.42b0
    # - opentelemetry-sdk ~=1.3
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-redis 
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.43b0
    # - opentelemetry-sdk ~=1.3
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-redis 
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6
    # - redis-py >=2.6

test:
  imports:
    - opentelemetry
    - opentelemetry.instrumentation
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-python-contrib/tree/main/instrumentation/opentelemetry-instrumentation-redis
  summary: OpenTelemetry Redis instrumentation
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mariusvniekerk
